title: Telecom Industry Solutions Consultant
description: As a Technical Solutions Consultant, you will be responsible for the technical relationship of our largest advertising clients and/or product partners. You will lead cross-functional teams in Engineering, Sales and Product Management to leverage emerging technologies for our external clients/partners.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 12 years of experience in either system design or one programming language. 12 years of experience in technical troubleshooting and managing partners or customers. Experience presenting to C-levels, driving value, differentiation, and technology messaging. Experience in cloud and telecom networks.
preferred_qualifications: Experience bringing innovative telecom products to the market. Experience in data-driven outcomes with AI/ML. Experience in hyper-growth/entrepreneurial environment. Understanding of Generative AI concepts. Ability to work cross-functionally.
responsibilities: Build and maintain strong customer relationships. Identify technology-driven strategies for telecom customers. Gather customer insights and feedback. Work collaboratively with Marketing, Sales, Product, or Engineering teams. Define business goals and drive cross-functional consensus.
